jdbcService.sql: select distinct * from ~nodes target left outer join ~node_connections nc on nc.target_id = target.id left outer join ~nodes source on source.id = nc.source_id join ~group_roles gr on (gr.node_id is null or target.path like replace('%' || gr.node_id || '%', '-', '') or (source.id is not null and source.path like replace('%' || gr.node_id || '%', '-', ''))) join ~action_roles ar on ar.role_id = gr.role_id join ~actions a on ar.action_id = a.id and (target.path like replace('%' || a.owner_id || '%', '-', '') or (source.id is not null and source.path like replace('%' || a.owner_id || '%', '-', ''))) join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = gr.group_id and ug.user_id = :userId where a.name = :actionName and (:componentId is null or target.component_id = :componentId)
